name: Shoot Game Play - Commando Terrorist
description:
Shoot Game Play - Commando Terrorist is a very interesting, elegant first person shoot game. It has beautiful frames,and is simple to control. As a commando, you need a great courage in the face of the fierce enemy. You must destroy the enemies , complete the tasks.
Features:
Realistic 3D simulation and challenging missions to accomplish
Multi Weapon game
Realistic combat action
Enemies’ destruction with hand grenades
Addictive game play and environment.
